com.example.aishuatiserver.mapper

接口 SubmitMapper


  • @Mapper
public interface SubmitMapper

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addRecode(Submit submit) 
      int addWrongProblem(int problemId, int stuId, int mySubmit) 
      int checkSubmit(int problemId, int stuId) 
      int getMaxSubmitId() 
      int judge(int problemId) 
      int showResult(int problemId, int stuId) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • judge

        @Select(value="select correct from problem where problem_Id = #{problemId}")
int judge(int problemId)

      • getMaxSubmitId

        @Select(value="select IFNULL(max(submit_Id),0) from submit")
int getMaxSubmitId()

      • addRecode

        @Insert(value="insert into submit values(#{submitId},#{stuId},#{problemId},#{result},#{submitTime},#{mySubmit})")
void addRecode(Submit submit)

      • showResult

        @Select(value="select result from submit where stu_id = #{stuId} and problem_Id = #{problemId} and  submit_time in (select max(submit_time) from submit\n where stu_id = #{stuId} and problem_Id = #{problemId})")
int showResult(int problemId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   int stuId)

      • checkSubmit

        @Select(value="select count(*) from submit where problem_Id = #{problemId} and stu_Id = #{stuId}")
int checkSubmit(int problemId,
                                                                                                                    int stuId)

      • addWrongProblem

        @Insert(value="Insert into wrongProblem (problem_Id,stu_Id,mySubmit) values(#{problemId},#{stuId},#{mySubmit})")
int addWrongProblem(int problemId,
                                                                                                                                      int stuId,
                                                                                                                                      int mySubmit)
